name: Machu Mayu
description:
Machu Mayu is a little adventure game - point & click.

The démo contains only 8 scenes and 1 quest very simple - the chapter one will contain 30 scenes, maybe more.

Soon news about story.

If you have a few critics on this demo , I'm open to read them.

Gameplay:

- just Left-click

Please play "run in window", not fullscreen (the game is make for a little window).
